title: Cheetah Mounts APTMM2B Flush Tilt (1.3" Profile) TV Wall Mount Bracket for 32-65 inch LED, LCD and Plasma Flat Screen TVs Up To VESA 684x400 and 165lbs, Including a Twisted Veins 10' Braided High Speed with Ethernet HDMI Cable and a 6" 3-Axis Magnetic Bubble Level
description: FITS 32-65" TVSThis mount fits essentially all 32-65"   TVs sold today. Specifically, it fits TVs with mounting holes as close   as 4"x4" or as wide as 27"x16" (in TV terms - VESA 100x100mm to   684x400mm).LOW 1.3" PROFILEThe  APTMM2B  profile is only 1.3" for today's thinner TVs yet still tilts to  improve  viewing and reduce glare. Due to the low profile, some TV’s  inputs are  difficult to reach once mounted. If input access is an issue,  Cheetah  offers various arm mounts.STRONGER WITH LESS METALThe   APTMM2B uses a "Stronger with Less Metal - Green" design, holding up  to  165lbs with less than 6lbs of steel. A unique design uses thicker  metal  in key areas of the mount.STANDARD SIZE PACKAGINGThe   APTMM2B fits Amazon's standard size package specifications, saving on   shipping and CO2 emissions and helping to get you your mount quickly.   The smaller box means some assembly is required.FITS 16" OR 24" STUDSThe APTMM2B is 26" wide for 16" or 24" studs typical in US homes.3 DEGREE ROTATION ADJUSTMENT AND COMPLIMENTARY LEVELThe APTMM2B wall slots allow for 3 degrees of rotation adjustment and a 6" 3-axis Magnetic Bubble Level ensures level mounting.10' HIGH SPEED WITH ETHERNET HDMI CABLEA Twisted Veins 10’ High Speed with Ethernet HDMI cable is included, featuring a braided jacket and capable of 3D 1080P signals.INCLUDES ALL NECESSARY MOUNTING HARDWAREThis mount ships with hardware for both wall and TV mounting.LIFETIME 100% GUARANTEEIf ANYTHING is wrong with your mount, please contact the Manufacturer. Your mount has a lifetime guarantee.
